/**
 * title: count_subscribers_per_locality
 * author: Innocent Obi Jr
 * description: 
 */
 
//Default configuration\ (Remove in production)
sc.hadoopConfiguration.set("fs.s3n.awsAccessKeyId", System.getenv("AWS_ID"))
sc.hadoopConfiguration.set("fs.s3n.awsSecretAccessKey", System.getenv("AWS_SECRET"))

val path_to_cdrs = "s3n://sierra-leone-lake/blob/cdrs/africell-raw/20200403_1[4-6].csv"
val path_to_towers = "s3n://sierra-leone-lake/blob/TOWERS/africell/sites_2020-07-03.csv"
val path_to_ouput =  "s3n://sierra-leone-lake/blob/AGGREGATED_CDRS/africell/count_subscribers_per_locality_per_day"
val cutoff : Int  = 15

* 
 */
import org.apache.spark.sql.functions.{split, lit, window, concat, unix_timestamp, to_timestamp, date_format}
import org.apache.spark.sql.types._
//import org.apache.spark.sql._
import org.apache.spark.sql.expressions.Window
import spark.implicits._
import org.apache.spark.storage.StorageLevel

 val calls = spark.read.format("csv")
    .option("header","false")
    .option("inferSchema", "true")
    .load(path_to_cdrs)
    .withColumnRenamed("_c0", "antenna_id")
    .withColumnRenamed("_c1", "time")
    .withColumnRenamed("_c2", "direction")
    .withColumnRenamed("_c3", "source")
    .withColumn("msisdn", col("source"))
    .withColumnRenamed("_c4", "target")
    .withColumnRenamed("_c5", "duration")
    .withColumn("site_id", substring(col("antenna_id"), 0, 4))
    .withColumn("call_datetime", to_timestamp($"time"))
    .withColumn("call_date", to_date($"call_datetime"))
    .withColumn("end_time",  to_timestamp(unix_timestamp($"call_datetime") + ($"duration")))
    

val cells = spark.read.format("csv")
  .option("header", true)
  .option("inferSchema", true)
  .load(path_to_towers)
  .withColumnRenamed("New_Dist", "locality")
  .withColumnRenamed("CI", "cell_id")

cells.persist(StorageLevel.MEMORY_AND_DISK)
cells.createOrReplaceTempView("cells")

calls.persist(StorageLevel.MEMORY_AND_DISK)
calls.createOrReplaceTempView("calls")

val countSubscribersPerLocalityPerDay = spark.sql(s"""
SELECT calls.call_date AS visit_date,
            cells.locality AS locality,
            count(DISTINCT msisdn) AS subscriber_count
        FROM calls
        INNER JOIN cells
            ON calls.site_id = cells.site_id
        WHERE calls.call_date >= '2020-02-01'
            AND calls.call_date <= CURRENT_DATE
        GROUP BY visit_date, locality
    ) AS grouped
    WHERE grouped.subscriber_count > $cutoff
""")

val countSubscribersPerLocalityPerWeek = spark.sql(s"""
    SELECT * FROM (
        SELECT extract(WEEK FROM calls.call_date) AS visit_week,
            cells.locality AS locality,
            count(DISTINCT msisdn) AS subscriber_count
        FROM calls
        INNER JOIN cells
            ON calls.site_id = cells.site_id
        WHERE calls.call_date >= '2020-02-01'
            AND calls.call_date <= CURRENT_DATE
        GROUP BY visit_week, locality
    ) AS grouped
    WHERE grouped.subscriber_count > $cutoff
""")
val countSubscribersPerLocalityPerHour = spark.sql(s"""
    SELECT * FROM (
        SELECT calls.call_date AS visit_date,
            extract(HOUR FROM calls.call_datetime) AS visit_hour,
            cells.locality AS locality,
            count(DISTINCT msisdn) AS subscriber_count
        FROM calls
        INNER JOIN cells
            ON calls.site_id = cells.site_id
        WHERE calls.call_date >= '2020-02-01'
            AND calls.call_date <= CURRENT_DATE
        GROUP BY visit_date, visit_hour, locality
    ) AS grouped
    WHERE grouped.subscriber_count > $cutoff
""")

countSubscribersPerLocalityPerDay.createOrReplaceTempView("count_subscribers_per_locality_per_day")
countSubscribersPerLocalityPerWeek.createOrReplaceTempView("count_subscribers_per_locality_per_week")
countSubscribersPerLocalityPerHour.createOrReplaceTempView("count_subscribers_per_locality_per_hour")
